FuncDef: The display qos link-adjustment configuration command displays the configuration of last-mile QoS on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display qos link-adjustment configuration interface gigabitethernet1/0/0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to display the following configuration of last-mile QoS on an interface:
Information indicating whether the Layer 2 header is neglected when CAR is implementedMode of last-mile QoSPacket adjustment value on the remote link

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
